basic.description: First order differential equations, linear differential equations with constant coefficients. Laplace transforms. Systems of linear differential equations. Examples involving the use of differential equations in solving circuits will be presented. (30/0/0/6/0)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Diff Equations For Elec & Comp

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusions: MATH231 and MATH232.  Prerequisite of (MATH118 and MATH128 and MATH129) or (APSC171 and APSC172 and APSC174) or (MATH120 and MATH11#) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
